item.description: This is a meetup for all of you train takers - This way you dont have to rush to south station - you are already there!! Plus my birthday is the following Saturday and i have to celebrate with my meetup buddies - So come on out - This place is not that huge so sorry I gotta limit the numbers - so if your plans cange please update your RSVP so others can join us!
item.how_to_find_us: You guys know me - if you don't look for the pink scarf around my neck...Its almost getting to warm for the scarf!
item.why: Because it is Erins Birthday week and you want to help her celebrate!
item.name: Clarke's Saloon at South Station
